channel.title: WiFi Direct on Mohyddin Tash
channel.description: Recent content in WiFi Direct on Mohyddin Tash

item.title: Smart Glasses
item.description: Wearable military grade glasses that live streams facial data to an online server for analysis, a bone conductor then provides feedback to personnel. Face recognition server takes less than 2 seconds to process the image. Requirements: The client had a facial recognition server already implemented. They wanted a wearable glass that can collect images and send them to the server for verification, then after getting the server’s response which is an audio file, play it through the bone conductor attached behind the user’s ear.
